stories.title: A Look at the Discovery Tech Stack at 99designs

stories.text:
We manually collected the best open source tools based on their Github rating (stars). All of these tools are used with K8s to build, deploy, monitor and secure workloads. You can check our work here:

https://thechief.io/c/editorial/top-51-kubernetes-tool-to-reach-the-cloud-native-nirvana/
stories.title: Top Kubernetes Tool to Reach the Cloud Native Nirvana

stories.text:
Hello HN!

This is Merve, co-founder at producter.co

We launched our first-ever widget on Producter and would love to hear your thoughts

Here we prepared a video to showcase our feedback widget: https://youtu.be/woevGBSEWsI

From now on, you can also give us your feedback using the widget
